entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #61048
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #61047
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes #61046
  • Perf improvement: https, single_query #61045
  • Default model binding for form requests consumes body automatically, causing Request Forwarding Issues #61043
  • [OpenAPI] XML source generator does not correctly escape `<see>` tags #61042
  • dotnet-getdocument support OpenAPI YAML format generation #61041
    Backlog
  • [OpenAPI] integers have additional string type with pattern #61038
  • [OpenAPI] error CS0122: 'Type' is inaccessible due to its protection level #61037
  • [OpenAPI] error CS0308: The non-generic type 'TypeName' cannot be used with type arguments #61035
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-generation, fortunes, json #61033
  • Support executing `IApiPublisher` implementors during application run #61031

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Func<Claim, bool>` #56331
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [OpenAPI] generates invalid reference for a type #61039
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, single_query #61012
  • Add method to retrieve current 2FA login provider #60085
    Backlog
  • Blazor [EditorRequired] is a good move but can we get a [EditorBindRequired] as well #61032
  • Non-standard redirect address for Login #61017
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware #60984

PullRequests

Created

  • Support generating OpenApiSchemas from transformers #61050
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [release/10.0-preview3] Re-enable WOW64, arm64 forwarders in Hosting Bundle #61049
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure
  • Depend on GetSourceBuildCommandConfiguration target to read from InnerBuildArgs #61044
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Use WriteImportMapToHtml=true in blazorwasm template #61036
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Remove explicit WasmBootConfigFileName from tests #61034
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4

Merged

  • Make signing less custom #61022
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Pass thru command line args to RepoTasks build #61040
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Re-enable WOW64, arm64 forwarders in Hosting Bundle #61026
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove unneeded 'fixed' statements from SocketAddress #61006
    area-networking, reduce-unsafe
  • [release/9.0] Caching SERedis critical bugfix; defer HC metadata detection because of DI cycle #60916
    Servicing-consider, feature-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • feat: fetch TLS client hello message from HTTP.SYS #60806
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
